synopsis.text:
Club life is in full swing at the Neighbors Club, a haven for misunderstood and misfortunate boys and girls seeking to forge new friendships. Despite Yozora Mikazuki's personal summertime dilemmas, the club's daily activities persist with unwavering enthusiasm. As new faces, including a peculiar nun and members of the student council, join the fray, Kodaka Hasegawa's responsibilities multiply.

Amidst the excitement of amusement park visits, gaming sessions, birthday celebrations, and the highly anticipated school festival, the club members' relationships begin to evolve. As they navigate the complexities of their coming-of-age journey, the Neighbors Club embraces a series of hilarious and heartwarming misadventures, proving that friendship can thrive even in the most unlikely circumstances. Prepare for the next chapter in this unpredictable love comedy!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
